pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===========django-htmx===========.. image:: https://img.shields.io/readthedocs/django-htmx?style=for-the-badge :target: https://django-htmx.readthedocs.io/en/latest/.. image:: https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/adamchainz/django-htmx/main.yml?branch=main&style=for-the-badge :target: https://github.com/adamchainz/django-htmx/actions?workflow=CI.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/Coverage-100%25-success?style=for-the-badge :target: https://github.com/adamchainz/django-htmx/actions?workflow=CI.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/django-htmx.svg?style=for-the-badge :target: https://pypi.org/project/django-htmx/.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/code%20style-black-000000.svg?style=for-the-badge :target: https://github.com/psf/black.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/pre--commit-enabled-brightgreen?logo=pre-commit&logoColor=white&style=for-the-badge :target: https://github.com/pre-commit/pre-commit :alt: pre-commitExtensions for using Django with `htmx <https://htmx.org/>`__.----**Improve your Django and Git skills** with `my books <https://adamj.eu/books/>`__.----Documentation-------------Please see https://django-htmx.readthedocs.io/ .
